title: Could AI text alerts help save snow leopards from extinction?
snippets: In Pakistan, it's hoped newly-developed AI cameras could warn villagers via text to move their livestock if snow leopards enter the area.
titles: Could AI text alerts help save snow leopards from extinction?
summary: In Pakistan, an innovative approach using AI cameras has been developed to protect livestock from snow leopards. These cameras are designed to detect the presence of snow leopards and send warning texts to villagers, advising them to move their livestock to safety. This technology aims to prevent conflicts between wildlife and local communities by providing timely alerts.

title: Hegseth shared Yemen attack details in second Signal chat, reports say
snippets: The private messaging group included the US defence secretary's wife, brother and personal lawyer, sources tell US media.
Reports come after defence chief attracted scrutiny last month over discussions of military plans in another group chat.
titles: Hegseth shared Yemen attack details in second Signal chat, reports say
US’s Hegseth shared Yemen attack details in second Signal chat, reports say
summary: A US media report reveals that the US Defense Secretary was part of a private messaging group with his wife, brother, and personal lawyer. This news surfaces after he faced scrutiny last month for sharing military plans in a different group chat.

title: China warns nations against 'appeasing' US in trade deals
snippets: Beijing was responding to reports that the US will pressure other nations to restrict trade with China.
titles: China warns nations against 'appeasing' US in trade deals
summary: Beijing has responded to reports indicating that the US plans to pressure other countries into limiting their trade with China. This move by the US aims to address concerns related to security and economic competition. The current status of these efforts and Beijing's specific responses to the reports have not been detailed.

title: A death every three minutes: Why India's roads are among the world's deadliest
snippets: India's roads claimed over 172,000 lives in 2023 - averaging 474 deaths daily, or one every three minutes.
titles: A death every three minutes: Why India's roads are among the world's deadliest
summary: In 2023, India experienced a significant number of road fatalities, with over 172,000 people losing their lives in traffic-related incidents. This averages to 474 deaths per day, or one death every three minutes, highlighting a major public safety concern within the country's transportation system.

title: Vance in Delhi to meet Modi amid tariff tensions
snippets: The talks are likely to focus on fast-tracking a trade deal, earlier expected to conclude by the end of 2025.
titles: Vance in Delhi to meet Modi amid tariff tensions
summary: Officials are engaged in discussions aimed at accelerating the completion of a trade deal, which was initially anticipated to be finalized by the end of 2025. The talks are centered on expediting this process.

title: John Cena Wins Record-Breaking 17th WWE World Championship at WrestleMania 41 in Las Vegas
snippets: Cena’s historic win closed out the final night of WrestleMania 41 in Las Vegas
titles: John Cena Wins Record-Breaking 17th WWE World Championship at WrestleMania 41 in Las Vegas
summary: John Cena secured a historic victory at WrestleMania 41 in Las Vegas, marking a significant achievement in his wrestling career. This win concluded the event's final night, highlighting Cena's enduring legacy in professional wrestling.

titles: Amorim told he’s working with a ‘damaged player’ as major ‘crisis’ needs to be solved before UEL SF – Shearer
summary: Manchester United suffered a 15th Premier League defeat, losing at home to Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sunday. This loss came shortly after securing a spot in the next round of a tournament on Thursday. The defeat marks a significant setback for Manchester United in their current season's performance.

title: How Flick interprets Barcelona stars’ explosive reaction on the bench against Celta – report
snippets: According to SPORT, the reaction of several Barcelona players to their limited or non-existent playing time during the recent win over Celta Vigo is not being seen as an internal problem.In fact, it i...
titles: How Flick interprets Barcelona stars’ explosive reaction on the bench against Celta – report
summary: Several Barcelona players have expressed dissatisfaction with their limited or non-existent playing time during the recent victory over Celta Vigo. However, SPORT reports that this issue is not considered an internal problem within the team.

titles: Borussia Mönchengladbach react to another loss against a direct European rival
summary: Borussia Mönchengladbach's head coach, Gerardo Seoane, experienced a challenging weekend, marked by a tense pre-match press conference on Friday and a similarly difficult session on Sunday evening. snippets: Real Madrid narrowly edged past Athletic Club 1-0 in a tense La Liga clash, thanks to Federico Valverde’s dramatic 93rd-minute winner. However, the match was not without controversy, as Vinicius Jr...
titles: The VAR audio behind Vinicius’ disallowed goal against Athletic Club
summary: Real Madrid secured a 1-0 victory over Athletic Club in a La Liga match, with Federico Valverde scoring the winning goal in the 93rd minute. The match featured a controversial moment involving Vinicius Jr., but the specific details of the controversy are not provided in the summary. Real Madrid's win is the key outcome of the event.

title: Dollar weakens as Trump attack on Fed chair Powell rattles markets
snippets: Gold rises to fresh record while Swiss franc reaches 10-year high
titles: Dollar weakens as Trump attack on Fed chair Powell rattles markets
summary: Gold prices have surged to a new all-time high, alongside the Swiss franc reaching its highest value in a decade. This financial movement reflects significant market shifts, with gold often seen as a safe investment during uncertain times, and the Swiss franc's strength indicating investor confidence in Switzerland's economy.

title: Beijing warns countries not to act against China in trade deals with US
snippets: Commerce ministry acts amid concerns that Washington will push trade partners to isolate Chinese goods and businesses
titles: Beijing warns countries not to act against China in trade deals with US
summary: The Commerce Ministry has taken action in response to concerns that the U.S. may encourage its trade partners to avoid Chinese goods and businesses. This move aims to address the potential for increased isolation of China in international trade relations.

title: China pulls back from US private equity investments
snippets: Industry executives report change of approach as Beijing bears brunt of Trump’s tariffs
titles: China pulls back from US private equity investments
summary: In response to the tariffs imposed by the Trump administration, industry executives have reported a shift in strategy to mitigate the impact of these trade barriers. The adjustments are particularly focused on operations and supply chains that are heavily impacted by the tariffs, indicating a significant response to the economic pressures from Washington. This shift aims to lessen the financial strain on businesses affected by the increased costs of importing goods into the United States from China.

title: Mapping the high tariff world
snippets: How the trade war will reorder the global economy — not burn it down
titles: Mapping the high tariff world
summary: The trade war is expected to reshape the global economy rather than causing widespread destruction. It will lead to changes in trade relationships, supply chains, and economic policies among countries. The outcome is a realignment of global economic structures rather than a collapse.

title: Egyptian billionaire Sawiris says ‘Tory incompetence’ forced him to quit UK
snippets: Aston Villa co-owner blames past Conservative governments, not the Labour chancellor, as he redomiciles to Italy and Abu Dhabi
titles: Egyptian billionaire Sawiris says ‘Tory incompetence’ forced him to quit UK
summary: Aston Villa's co-owner has attributed his decision to redomicile to Italy and Abu Dhabi to the policies of past Conservative governments, rather than the current Labour chancellor. This move reflects his stance on the political and economic environment shaped by previous administrations.
